common_conditions.name: Common Cold
common_conditions.advice: Rest, drink fluids, use OTC cold remedies. See a doctor if symptoms persist beyond 10 days.

common_conditions.name: Allergies
common_conditions.advice: Try antihistamines. Reduce exposure to allergens. Consult doctor if symptoms are severe.

common_conditions.name: Flu
common_conditions.advice: Rest, stay hydrated, and take fever reducers. Seek medical attention if symptoms worsen.

common_conditions.name: Migraine
common_conditions.advice: Rest in a dark, quiet room. Use prescribed medications. Consult a doctor for frequent migraines.

common_conditions.name: Stomach Ache
common_conditions.advice: Avoid heavy meals, drink clear fluids, and rest. See a doctor if pain is severe or persistent.

common_conditions.name: COVID-19
common_conditions.advice: Isolate, monitor symptoms, and consult a healthcare provider. Seek emergency care for severe symptoms.

common_conditions.name: Hypertension
common_conditions.advice: Maintain a healthy diet, exercise regularly, and take prescribed medications. Monitor blood pressure regularly.

common_conditions.name: Diabetes
common_conditions.advice: Monitor blood sugar levels, follow a healthy diet, exercise, and take prescribed medications.

common_conditions.name: Cholesterol
common_conditions.advice: Maintain a healthy diet, exercise regularly, and take prescribed medications. Monitor cholesterol levels.

common_conditions.name: Gastritis
common_conditions.advice: Avoid spicy foods, alcohol, and NSAIDs. Consult a doctor for severe symptoms.

common_conditions.name: Sinusitis
common_conditions.advice: Use saline nasal sprays, stay hydrated, and consider decongestants. Consult a doctor if symptoms persist.

common_conditions.name: Bronchitis
common_conditions.advice: Rest, drink fluids, and consider over-the-counter cough medications. Consult a doctor if symptoms worsen.

common_conditions.name: Asthma
common_conditions.advice: Use prescribed inhalers, avoid triggers, and seek medical attention for severe symptoms.

common_conditions.name: Anxiety
common_conditions.advice: Practice relaxation techniques, exercise, and consider therapy or medication. Consult a healthcare provider.

common_conditions.name: Depression
common_conditions.advice: Seek therapy, consider medication, and maintain a support network. Consult a healthcare provider.

common_conditions.name: Back Pain
common_conditions.advice: Rest, apply heat or ice, and consider over-the-counter pain relievers. Consult a doctor if pain persists.

common_conditions.name: Skin Rash
common_conditions.advice: Avoid scratching, apply soothing creams, and consult a dermatologist if rash worsens or persists.

common_conditions.name: Heartburn
common_conditions.advice: Avoid spicy foods, eat smaller meals, and consider antacids. Consult a doctor if symptoms are frequent.

common_conditions.name: Joint Pain
common_conditions.advice: Rest, apply ice, and consider over-the-counter pain relievers. Consult a doctor if pain persists.

common_conditions.name: Insomnia
common_conditions.advice: Establish a sleep routine, limit screen time before bed, and consult a doctor if insomnia persists.

common_conditions.name: Constipation
common_conditions.advice: Increase fiber intake, drink plenty of water, and consider over-the-counter laxatives. Consult a doctor if symptoms persist.

common_conditions.name: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)
common_conditions.advice: Drink plenty of fluids, avoid irritants, and consult a doctor for antibiotics if symptoms persist.

common_conditions.name: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
common_conditions.advice: Avoid trigger foods, eat smaller meals, and consider over-the-counter medications. Consult a doctor if symptoms persist.

common_conditions.name: Pneumonia
common_conditions.advice: Seek medical attention immediately. Treatment may include antibiotics and rest.

common_conditions.name: Osteoarthritis
common_conditions.advice: Maintain a healthy weight, exercise regularly, and consider physical therapy. Consult a doctor for severe symptoms.

common_conditions.name: Psoriasis
common_conditions.advice: Use topical treatments, moisturize regularly, and consult a dermatologist for severe cases.

common_conditions.name: Eczema
common_conditions.advice: Moisturize regularly, avoid irritants, and consult a dermatologist for severe cases.

common_conditions.name: Tension Headache
symptoms: tightness in forehead or back of head
common_conditions.advice: Rest, apply heat, and consider over-the-counter pain relievers. Consult a doctor if headaches are frequent.

common_conditions.name: Tendonitis
common_conditions.advice: Rest the affected area, apply ice, and consider physical therapy. Consult a doctor if symptoms persist.

common_conditions.name: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
common_conditions.advice: Rest the affected hand, use wrist splints, and consider physical therapy. Consult a doctor if symptoms persist.
